about_the_game:
An experimental accident in theoretical physics occurred in Qianhai City, leaving the local law enforcement agencies clueless, forcing them to seek assistance from you, ITEO Special Investigator Zenmeil.


Investigate the cause of the accident.


Enter the inner world of others.


Explore the secrets of the inner world.


Encounter and resolve battles.


This is your only chance to return to "Myth."


Freedom, power, salvation, eternity, or truth, choose your path.


5 major professional sequences, 9 major professions, 3 stages of professional advancement, 300+ explorable maps, 360+ monsters, 120+ skills, 300+ pieces of equipment, 120+ team characters, now, take the first step on your journey.
detailed_description:
An experimental accident in theoretical physics occurred in Qianhai City, leaving the local law enforcement agencies clueless, forcing them to seek assistance from you, ITEO Special Investigator Zenmeil.


Investigate the cause of the accident.


Enter the inner world of others.


Explore the secrets of the inner world.


Encounter and resolve battles.


This is your only chance to return to "Myth."


Freedom, power, salvation, eternity, or truth, choose your path.


5 major professional sequences, 9 major professions, 3 stages of professional advancement, 300+ explorable maps, 360+ monsters, 120+ skills, 300+ pieces of equipment, 120+ team characters, now, take the first step on your journey.
name: 心理学黑客2044 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated some cases, this tool will not launch unless the sound utility "Nahimic" is stopped.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated some cases, this tool will not launch unless the sound utility "Nahimic" is stopped.
